# PortalComponent.Options

**Structure**

Options to toggle the portal features on and off.

## Declaration

```swift
struct Options
```

## Overview

This option set is equivalent to setting [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/PortalComponent/clippingMode-swift.property] and [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/PortalComponent/crossingMode-swift.property] directly.

Use this type with [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/PortalComponent/init(target:plane:options:)].

## Type Properties

- **allowCrossing**: An option that enables the crossing feature.
- **clipContents**: An option that enables the clipping feature.

## Conforms To

- Equatable
- ExpressibleByArrayLiteral
- OptionSet
- RawRepresentable
- SetAlgebra
